## add() function

Add two numbers

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function add(a: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | number | the first num |
|  b | number | the second num |

**Returns:**

number

Sum of two numbers

## Remarks

This is a remark for add function to explain more about it.

## Example


```ts
import { add } from 'my-ts-lib';
const sum = add(1, 2); // 3
```
